mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.dataset_id as datasetId, s.user_id AS userId, s.role_id AS roleId, r.role_name as roleName, s.config AS config, s.create_time AS createTime, s.update_time AS updateTime FROM dashboard_dataset_auth s LEFT JOIN dashboard_user u ON u.user_id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN dashboard_role r ON s.role_id = r.role_id
